title: Notification unsubscription details
description: Adobe Campaign notification unsubscriptions allow endusers opt out after opting into topics that can be used for communication such as Marketing subscription lists.

xdm:unsubscriptionDate.title: Unsubscription Date
xdm:unsubscriptionDate.description: Date and time when the enduser has unsubscribed from a notification topic. When the subscription is registered the xdm:unsubscriptionDate must be empty.

xdm:remarkID.title: Remark Identifier
xdm:remarkID.description: The pre defined remark that the enduser identified when unbsubscribing.

xdm:remarkText.title: Remark text
xdm:remarkText.description: A customer comment/remark that the enduser provided when unbsubscribing.
